title: Plat 2 Mid/ADC LF Friends (all ranks, serious or casual)

embed.description: Syncro / Platinum 2 43LP / 70W 65L Win Ratio 52% / Orianna - 16W 11L Win Ratio 59%, Corki - 8W 10L Win Ratio 44%, Syndra - 9W 8L Win Ratio 53%, Caitlyn - 9W 7L Win Ratio 56%, Lissandra - 7W 6L Win Ratio 54%

body:
I'm looking for people to play league with! Most of my friends no longer play and I miss the days of having a 5 stack and just having fun.
As you can see from my op.gg I'm an okay player having reached Diamond last season but don't let this deter any lower ranks.

_**If there is a serious team looking for a player I'd also like to hear from you!**_

Although I've listed Mid/ADC I don't mind playing other roles, these are simply the ones I am most experienced/proficient.

Thanks for your time and don't be shy in adding me, I really enjoy helping lower people improve their game as long as you are dedicated.

Syncro

replies.body: Hey man, my team Serenity are looking for an ADC atm, add me to have a bit of a chat about it :)
